install_msg: Thanks for installing the beta. Please note that I currently do not support this cog and it can change and/or break at any time. Unless you havea  good reason to use it now, please uninstall it until I've declared it as available (check the repo Readme for a list of released and supported cogs)
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
